prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Korálky Katlas has prepared a summary of important points to consider when purchasing finished jewelry and jewelry components, in response to these issues.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Korálky Katlas, summary, purchasing, finished jewelry, jewelry components
